args.subject: Summary of the shared document
args.body:
Hi Lily, 

I have downloaded and summarized the document you shared with me. Here is the summary:

The document is a thank you note for attending the first book club meeting and discusses insights on 'The Great Gatsby'. It also announces that the next book for the club is 'The Old Man and the Sea' and provides a link to an online resource: www.bookclub.com.

Best, 
Emma

messages.content: The email has been sent successfully.
